title: Textile, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 96 x 70 cm (37 13/16 x 27 9/16 in.)
Repeat H: 62.2 cm (24 1/2 in.)
description: All-over repeat of pastoral amorous scenes in red: lovers half reclining in wheat field (she holding a horn) surprised by a man holding a sickle; lovers seated next to a fountain mutually playing a flute; two women in a garden (one clutching the other) being watched by a man behind a huge urn; boy playing bagpipe among geese; cupid fishing for eels; woman writing in a garden watched by Cupid. Straight repeat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. 1973-25-11.
